description: There is nothing quite like freshly baked bread. This recipe takes time but the results are worth it. For German Sourdough Bread (Bauernbrot), replace 2 cups of the bread flour in the dough with rye flour.
name: Sourdough Bread with Fennel Seeds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 220°C. Lightly dust the loaf with flour then, using a sharp knife, slash the top in a diamond pattern. Bake for 15 minutes. Lower the oven temperature to 190°C and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread sounds hollow when tapped underneath. Transfer to a wire rack and let cool.
